message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and I'll take 90%, we can adjust in later rounds if you want.
You're being generous, but I think I can do better. Your turn was too kind.
I'm willing to compromise. 60/40 split seems fair, considering the inflation.
I'm not sure 60/40 is fair, considering the inflation is affecting me more than you. I'll try to get a better deal.
